Translation and Dub from Russian into English

While making different videos, perspective companies, universities, state organizations, and governmental institutions intend to spread these videos around the globe. And the first problem that appears immediately is the difficulties while translating and dubbing the videos in different languages. In this short article, we will talk about the language pair of Russian and English, how to translate a video from Russian to English, and the benefits of working with a video translator VidBy.

The popularity and specification of the language pair

Russian and English is a fascinating and famous languages pair just because many people worldwide can fluently speak and understand them. So, it is crucially important to have a shot at translating and dubbing your videos within the frame of this language pair.

English is the world’s first most spoken language that is spoken by over one billion people. This language has many dialects, like American English, British English, Australian English, etc.

Russian is the language that is commonly used by the citizens of Russia. However, many people from the CIS countries can understand it as well.

The complexity of this language pair lies in Russian because it is one of the most difficult languages to learn. Consequently, there are not so many specialists who can translate and dub your videos in the right way. But VidBy can help you solve this problem and translate Russian video to English with a great accurate rate.

How to translate from Russian to English: The algorithm of work

VidBy applies an innovative technology based on the implementation of artificial intelligence, so the question appears how to translate Russian video to English with the help of this platform. Right now, we are going to explain the algorithm of its work from your perspective.

So, it is necessary to upload your video to the service so the service understands what it needs to translate. As an additional option, you can put a direct link to the video you want to localize in a special line in the middle of the website’s home page.

Afterward, you will be asked to specify the details of your order so that the service will be able to choose the right algorithm for translation and dub the video from Russian to English or vice versa. The needed information is the video’s original language, the language of the translated fragment, the voice’s details, etc.

One more thing to require is the payment for the services. Without paying, the service will not start the process. You can choose one of the following payment systems:

  • Visa/Mastercard;
  • ApplePay/GooglePay;
  • PayPal;
  • SWIFT transfers.

When the payment is made successfully, the software will initiate the process and inform you when it will be ended. After this, you will receive a link to download the final result.

Additional features of VidBy

You see that the online Russian to English video translation process is not that complicated from your perspective. Still, the platform developers have tried their best and developed additional features to make the video translator service advanced and better.

Add a drop of emotions

Without emotions, any translated and dubbed video is nothing, and it cannot share the primary idea to the audience properly. That is why it was decided to develop a feature that would add some emotional touch. At the present moment, this idea is in the stage of development. However, users can already take advantage of it and apply a few emotions to the videos:

  • Anger;
  • Joy;
  • Sadness;

And with their help, your dubbed videos will be way more realistic and will be able to convey the idea in the right way.

Speech synthesizer

One more thing to consider is the availability to generate a translated speech by using different voices, like the voices of children, teenagers, adults, and seniors. So, it is another step to making VidBy the perfect service specializing in video and audio translation processes.

What are the benefits of working with VidBy?

You know about two additional features that help VidBy stand out from the crowd. But, the list of advantages is not finished at this point.

Quick translation result

Understandably, a quick delivery time plays a crucial role in these processes. Thus, you need to know that VidBy offers an exceptional delivery time because of the implementation of innovative technology based on artificial intelligence. This technology guarantees an impressive result as well - 1000 faster compared to other companies related to translating Russian video to English.

Guaranteed quality of the video translation

The video and audio translation service VidBy ensures its customers that the quality of the Russian to English video translation service is at its highest point. And this is true due to the additional features that allow to use of emotions and generate voices in different tones.

Low cost

Usually, it is impossible to dub and translate Russian video to English or vice versa without hiring additional forces: a professional artist and voice translator. But, the situation with VidBy is different - the only thing required to process the translation of your video is the AI-based software. Thus, it helps reduce the costs and save your money.

A variety of subscriptions

The video translation service VidBy has three different subscriptions for business customers who deal with the Russian to English video translation processes regularly.

  • Basis ($750). It allows customers to upload videos (maximum of 80 minutes with an output of 300 minutes) and dub them using one voice.
  • Extended ($1450). This subscription is designed for more demanding customers and includes a more extensive length of the original videos (maximum of 200 minutes with an output of 750 minutes). In addition, it is possible to apply three different voices.
  • Professional ($2950). This plan includes all the advantages of the Extended subscription, but with a significant change and additional opportunities, like the ability to edit transcripts.

An opportunity to edit

As mentioned, you can edit your transcripts while having the Professional subscription. And in a general way, this opportunity helps make the translated videos more understandable for a global audience.

A step-by-step guide: how to get a translated video from Russian into English?

And it is the right time to understand how to translate a video from Russian to English with the help of the video translator VidBy. But firstly, you need to be aware that it is an automized process, which requires going through a few simple steps.

  • Step 1. To start translating and dubbing, it is necessary to visit the official website of the platform VidBy.
  • Step 2. The website will request you to provide it with the video you want to translate from Russian to English. It can be done in two ways. The first one is to put a link to the video on the Internet (like on YouTube). Or you can upload the video from your device.
  • Step 3. When the video is provided to the service, your task is to give the specifications of your order. It means that you need to legibly indicate the original language of the incoming video, the language of the outcoming translated video, and a few more parameters.
  • Step 4. It is almost the last step - to process a payment for the services provided. During the step of specification of the order, the system will calculate and estimate the delivery time. Bear in mind that this delivery time starts from the moment of accepting the order, namely after the successful payment.
  • Step 5. And finally, you need to wait until the service does the translating and dubbing work, so you can easily download the translated and dubbed video from Russian to English.

Five elementary steps and you know how to translate Russian video to English.
